page.title: 06Kirkby Youth Workshop
page.content: Kirkby Youth Workshop is part of YTS. The trainees produce bunk-beds, coffee tables and soft furnishings. The scheme lasts for twelve months, and is broken down into seven separate areas:-clerical, sewing, painting and decorating, joinery, carpentry, metalwork and catering. The day lasts from 8:30a.m until 4:30p.m, with a 15 minute break during the morning, and 45 minutes for lunch. On Friday the trainees finish at 2:30p.m. The trainees attend college one day per week for one week during the year the take part in an outdoor pursuit course which includes canoeing, swimming and many other sports. The scheme has been very succesful, and in 1985, 80% of the trainees were succesful in finding full time jobs.
